text: "Fight Music" is a hip hop single by the rap group D12. It is on their debut album Devil's Night. The song has lyrics about violence and dangerous street fighting. ==Track listing== The European CD single and Europe and Australia Maxi single are available with six different covers - one of each of the D12 band members. UK CD single European CD single Europe and Australia Maxi single US 12" vinyl UK 12" vinyl and Cassette UK DVD single ;Notes * signifies a co- producer. ==Charts== Chart (2001) Peak position Ireland (IRMA) 16 == Certifications == ==References== Category:D12 songs Category:2001 songs Category:Rap rock songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: Fight Music
